projects.title: Business Websites & Landing Pages
projects.description: Designed and developed responsive websites for small businesses and personal brands, focusing on accessibility, performance, and clean UI.
achievements: Delivered end‑to‑end projects including planning, development, and deployment
Improved Lighthouse performance scores to 90+ across multiple projects

projects.title: E‑commerce & API Integrations
projects.description: Integrated payment gateways and third‑party APIs, and implemented secure forms and dashboards.
achievements: Reduced integration time with reusable components and utilities

projects.title: Full Stack .NET Web Application Development
projects.description: Led and developed core features of (Styleza), a scalable web application using C#, .NET Core, and SQL for backend functionality and HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript for front-end interfaces. Utilized ASP.NET Core MVC and Docker for containerization, ensuring efficient deployment and performance.
achievements: Implemented most core functionality while guiding a 6-member team
Optimized APIs, improving response times by 15%
Reduced deployment errors by 20% using Docker

projects.title: Database Management & Optimization
projects.description: Designed and optimized SQL databases, wrote efficient queries, and performed performance tuning to enhance application speed and reliability.
achievements: Reduced database query execution time by 25%, improving overall application performance

projects.title: Client Management System Development
projects.description: Built a client management system using React, JavaScript, and .NET to streamline workflow and improve client communication. Implemented responsive design principles to ensure compatibility across devices.
achievements: Delivered the project 2 weeks ahead of schedule, receiving positive feedback from clients for improved usability

projects.title: Freelance Business Skills Training
projects.description: Participated in an intensive training program focused on client communication, pricing strategies, and project management. Applied these skills to manage multiple freelance projects simultaneously.
achievements: Successfully negotiated project terms with 5+ clients, increasing freelance income by 30%

projects.title: Data Management & Analysis
projects.description: Managed and analyzed data for various projects, ensuring accuracy and efficiency. Used Microsoft Excel and SQL to organize and process large datasets.
achievements: Developed a data management process that reduced errors by 20% and improved reporting efficiency by 15%

projects.title: Marketing & Sales Support
projects.description: Assisted in creating marketing strategies and managing sales operations. Used CRM tools to track customer interactions and improve engagement.
achievements: Contributed to a marketing campaign that increased social media engagement by 40% and boosted sales by 25% in 6 months
